channel.title: Need help with a simple command
channel.description:
ok on the Z508 source server, there is a command for admins whic is ::special which give u ur special bar back, but admins can only be level 0, how do i let them be regular level based on their stats or how do i make the command for mods...
please help me
I need Admins to be regular levels
or make the command for mods

item.title: Need help with a simple command
item.dc:creator: @cj_howat cj_howat@hotmail.com
item.description:
@cj_howat wrote:

Go to the PlayerUpdateMasks class, and you will find:
if (p.rights >= 2) {
combat = 0;
}
Delete it!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a simple command
